title: Field of Glory II

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 560 Series (POLARIS11 / DRM 3.23.0 / 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
notes:
Initially game crashed with The launcher starts but the games crashes. "Failed to create device for rendering. Invalid resolution or cannot run without at least shader model 3.0 (0)'. To fix that one need to apply fix described in https://forum.winehq.org/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=30764

1. Go to <steam-library</steamapps/compatdata/660160/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/FieldOfGlory2.
2. Open OPTIONS.TXT.
3. Change RezX to your horizontal resolution (mine is RezX 1920).
4. Change RezY to your vertical resolution (mine is RezX 1200).
5. Change Fullscreen to 0.

After that the game can be run. I hadn't observed any issues, although it was my first play ever.
title: Field of Glory II

notes: Works great once you edit OPTIONS.TXT. That file was not in the same place as for others. I found it in /Steam/steamapps/common/Field of Glory II/Core/UI
title: Field of Glory II

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 620 (Kaby Lake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
